law.catch_line: Each licensee shall display the license conspicuously in the office or place of employment of the li...

text.section: Each licensee shall display the license conspicuously in the office or place of employment of the licensee.
If a licensee has more than one place of business, the licensee shall notify the Board of the address the Board may use to send notices and other correspondence.
A licensee shall notify the Board in writing of a change of address within 30 days after the change of address.
